version_description:
- UI, performance and stability improvements

We really appreciate all the love we've received so far, and if you like our software please feel free to write a review. We are working hard to give you the best possible user experience, so make sure to keep Voisey updated as we will roll out improvements and new features continuously. Any feedback is highly appreciated, give us a shout at hello@voisey.app

- Voiseys will now continue to play when you lock the screen or put the app in the background
- Performance and stability improvements

We really appreciate all the love we've received so far, and if you like our software please feel free to write a review. We are working hard to give you the best possible user experience, so make sure to keep Voisey updated as we will roll out improvements and new features continuously. Any feedback is highly appreciated, give us a shout at hello@voisey.app

- Four new voice filters!
- The "private sharing" section has a fresh new look.
- Fixed a bug where long comments would get cut off.
- As always, many more performance and stability improvements.

- Push notification settings: You can now choose the types of notifications you want to receive and who you want to receive them from
- Beat settings: Producers can now edit and delete their beats directly in the app.
- Fixed a bug where usernames that consisted of only numbers were not recognized or linked to profiles
- A bunch of under-the-hood performance and reliability improvements

We really appreciate all the love we've received so far, and if you like our software please feel free to write a review. We are working hard to give you the best possible user experience, so make sure to keep Voisey updated as we will roll out improvements and new features continuously. Any feedback is highly appreciated, give us a shout at hello@voisey.app

- Introducing Splits: see all split-screen recordings over your own or others voiseys by tapping the new Splits button
- Fixed an issue where users would be logged out if the device was offline on launch.
- Numerous bug fixes and performance improvements

We really appreciate all the love we've received so far, and if you like our software please feel free to write a review. We are working hard to give you the best possible user experience, so make sure to keep Voisey updated as we will roll out improvements and new features continuously. Any feedback is highly appreciated, give us a shout at hello@voisey.app

- Fixed an issue where the attributions on shared voiseys could be incorrect
- Fixed an issue where VoiceOver could not be used when recording a voisey
- Fixed a rare crash during recording setup
- Fixed a rare crash in the notifications view
- Fixed a bug where the wrong voisey could be edited if you were on a settings screen just as a voisey completed uploading
- Other under-the-hood performance and stability improvements

- Adds support for images in push notifications
- Notifications in the activity tab now show a thumbnail of new voiseys published by users you follow
- Fixes an issue where buttons and banners in the search tab would be unresponsive on some devices
- Fixes an issue where the camera would remain active (but unused) after finishing a recording
- Other performance improvements and bug fixes

- NEW Activity page: redesigned and now with filters!
- FIX issue where deleted beats could not be removed from favorites
- Performance improvements and bug fixes

What’s New
• Browse recent voiseys for beats, splits and hashtags
• You can now see trending voiseys when browsing a beat

Bug Fixes
• The unread notification badge was stuck, now it’s not
• UI and UX improvements
